ai-kv4.10:1.1_0: the abandoning of all fetters and perfection.

ai-kv4.10:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.

ai-kv4.10:3.1_0: identity view, doubt, and misapprehension of precepts and observances, and misapprehension of precepts and observances.
ai-kv4.10:3.3_0: The Buddha has not given up the three fetters, and the fruit of stream-entry.
ai-kv4.10:3.5_0: The Buddha has given up three fetters, and we’ve already accepted the fruit of stream-entry. And he said to Revata
ai-kv4.10:3.6_0: and that path is given up all the fetters,
ai-kv4.10:4.1_0: are given up all the fetters.
ai-kv4.10:4.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.10:5.3_0: The Buddha has not declared the fruit of sensual desire, ill will, and the fruit of once-return.
ai-kv4.10:5.5_0: Carefully he can be attained by the Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, but not the fruit of once-return.
ai-kv4.10:5.6_0: and that path is given up all the fetters,
ai-kv4.10:6.1_0: are given up all the fetters.
ai-kv4.10:6.3_0: it gives up sensual desire to perfection.
ai-kv4.10:6.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.10:7.1_0: it gives up sensual desire to perfection.
ai-kv4.10:7.3_0: He doesn’t non-return in the future.
ai-kv4.10:7.5_0: Certainly he said to those who enjoy sensual desire and ill will, not for the sake of non-return.
ai-kv4.10:7.6_0: and that path is given up all the fetters,
ai-kv4.10:8.1_0: are given up all the fetters.
ai-kv4.10:8.3_0: on account of regard for form and reality, greed for the forest, desire to attain Arahantship in the Liberation of All these.
ai-kv4.10:8.5_0: our enemies trade, violent, and greedy for form, but don’t proceed to perfection.
ai-kv4.10:8.6_0: and that path is given up all the fetters,
ai-kv4.10:9.2_0: “For the complete giving up of all fetters!”
ai-kv4.10:9.4_0: All the perfected one has given up all fetters,
ai-kv4.10:9.6_0: and destroyed them all the fetters, you should say:
ai-kv4.10:9.7_0: “For the complete giving up of all fetters!”
ai-kv4.10:9.8_0: The story at all is finished.
ai-kv4.10:9.9_0: The fourth group of five is finished.
ai-kv4.10:10.1_0: The possession of the eight factors. All of a layperson has the four qualities of perfected ones, all of them, possessed of the fruit of the Bodhisatta. They have mastered the spiritual life. And they possessed the six factors.
